application/json.descripcion: High-altitude viewpoint on Tenerife (approx. 2,300 m). Very low light pollution and excellent horizon visibility. Ideal for astrophotography; dress warmly at night.
Certified Starlight Reserve with an observatory and public viewing areas. Outstanding sky quality, especially in winter and summer evenings.

application/json.nombre: Cabo de Gata - Playa de los Genoveses
application/json.descripcion: Coastal dark-sky beach with a wide southern horizon; good for summer stargazing. Limited facilities and seasonal access restrictions may apply.

id_cielo_visible.description: Primary key for the visible-sky object record.

tipo.description: Type of visible object. Example values: 'star','planet','constellation','phenomenon','satellite'.

nombre.description: Name or identifier of the object (e.g. 'Jupiter', 'Orion').

descripcion.description: Free text description with visibility notes and best viewing times.

ultima_actualizacion.description: ISO8601 timestamp of the last update for this record.

id_alerta.description: Primary key for the alerta record.

tipo_alerta.description: Type of alert. Example values: FASE_LUNAR, CONSTELACIONES, EVENTO, PERSONALIZADA.

parametro_objetivo.description: Optional parameter for target matching, e.g. 'Waxing Crescent' for lunar phase or a constellation name.

fecha_objetivo.description: Target date for one-time alerts (ISO date yyyy-mm-dd).

ultima_notificacion.description: Timestamp of the last notification sent for this alert.
